resources.string: One token remaining for this month
Use in any partner food provider mess
1. Go on home page, look the menu of one day plans and choose any mess which you like. \n\n2. Go there and ask for QR code, after scanning you can enjoy your free meal.
Click below button to updated your location
Click the yellow button to upload
Send Messege to Subscribed Mess Owner
Scan the QR code present on Mess mobile before receiving the food
P L A N N A M E

Welcome to Daily Bites, your go-to mobile app for hassle-free and delicious daily meals. We are on a mission to connect users with local mess owners, providing a convenient and affordable subscription service for lunch and dinner.

Our app is designed with simplicity and convenience in mind. With just a few taps, you can explore a wide range of food options and connect with our trusted food partners who handle the delivery. Say goodbye to the stress of cooking or searching for a good meal â€“ Daily Bites has got you covered.

1. Easy Ordering: Our user-friendly interface makes it effortless to browse through our diverse menu and select your preferred meals. With just a few taps, you can customize your order to match your tastes and dietary preferences.

2. Trusted Food Partners: We collaborate with licensed and reputable food partners who adhere to food safety and hygiene regulations. This ensures that the meals you receive are prepared with the freshest ingredients and meet high-quality standards.

3. Timely Deliveries: Our dedicated food partners handle the delivery process, ensuring that your meals arrive on time, every time. Simply sit back, relax, and let us take care of your daily bites.

4. Flexible Subscriptions: We offer a variety of subscription plans to suit your needs. You have the freedom to modify or cancel your subscription based on your preferences and schedule.

5. Varied Menu Options: From delicious entrees to wholesome vegetarian or vegan dishes, our menu offers a wide range of options to cater to different palates and dietary needs. Enjoy a variety of meals that are both delicious and nutritious.

6. User-Friendly Experience: Our app is designed to make your experience seamless and enjoyable. We value your feedback and continuously strive to enhance your dining experience based on your suggestions.

Join the Daily Bites community and experience the convenience of having delicious meals delivered to your doorstep. Download our app today and indulge in the joy of effortless dining.

We are committed to providing you with a delightful culinary experience while ensuring the highest standards of food safety and quality. If you have any questions or need assistance, our support team is here to help. Happy eating with Daily Bites!

1. Acceptance of Terms By using our app, you acknowledge and agree to the following terms and conditions.

2. Mess owners must create an account to use our app. You must provide accurate and up-to-date information during the registration process.

3. Our app provides a platform to connect mess owners with consumers. You are solely responsible for the quality, safety, and legality of the meals you provide to consumers.

4. Mess owners may set their own prices for meals. The app may facilitate payment transactions between mess owners and consumers. We reserve the right to charge a commission or service fee for each transaction.

5. Consumers may leave reviews and ratings for your mess. You understand and agree that these reviews and ratings may be publicly displayed on our app.

6. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if you violate these terms and conditions. You may also terminate your account at any time by contacting our support team.

7. We are not responsible for any damages, losses, or liabilities arising from the use of our app or any transactions between mess owners and consumers. We do not guarantee the availability or quality of the meals provided by mess owners

1. Acceptance of Terms By using our app, you acknowledge and agree to the following terms and conditions.

2. Consumers must create an account to use our app. You must provide accurate and up-to-date information during the registration process.

3. You may place meal orders through the app. Payment for meals may be facilitated through the app. You understand that mess owners are solely responsible for the quality, safety, and legality of the meals they provide.

4. You may leave reviews and ratings for mess owners. Your reviews and ratings must be truthful and based on your own experiences.

5. Mess owners may have their own cancellation and refund policies. You are responsible for reviewing and understanding the cancellation and refund policies of mess owners before placing an order.

6. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if you violate these terms and conditions. You may also terminate your account at any time by contacting our support team
